about_the_game:
::TS FEATURES::

  • Vast selection of weapons, characters, and maps allow virtually unlimited possibilities
  • Fun is more important than balance
  • Over 40 cool weapons ranging from experimental / conventional / alien / futuristic / weird
  • Radical environments across many settings and genres
  • Super satisfying movement with optional powerups like bunnyhops and dashjet
  • Aesthetic Artstyle
  • Character cast includes human-sized-squirrel, robots, aliens, and a Mech riding cat
  • Mix and match body parts to increase weirdness of your character
  • Every map has a bathroom

::GET TRIGGERED::

  • Trigger Spree's full of unique, wacky, & conventional weapons, here's a preview
  • Nade-balla: fire a bouncy explosive Nadeball that rolls around and remotely detonates
  • NRG Streamer: weapon of unknown origin that shoots a constant energy stream
  • Acid Nozzle: A high-powered "water-gun" that shoots acid instead of water
  • Laser Pistol: Bounce lasers off the wall with this alien weapon
  • G.T.A.R.: Guitar Type Audio Rifle. Shatter your opponents with guitar riffs
  • Firework Launcher: Shoots fireworks, don't get distracted by the beautiful explosion
  • P77: Insanely Inaccurate but fast submachine gun

::NOTES::

Read entire EULA carefully before installing or playing. All info in this page subject to change. Game uses P2P listen servers, no dedicated servers. Photosensitive Seizure warning. Thanks For Your interest.

content_descriptors.notes:
Game has light violence (blood FX and ragdoll)
References to alcohol and/or Drugs
Lewd Humor

detailed_description:
::TS FEATURES::

  • Vast selection of weapons, characters, and maps allow virtually unlimited possibilities
  • Fun is more important than balance
  • Over 40 cool weapons ranging from experimental / conventional / alien / futuristic / weird

name: Trigger Spree

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (or higher) 64 Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3450, 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 (or higher) 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
